commit message: Change app name to cyrilic
Fix crash when the user pauses the app twice during the first launch
Add GoneMAD to the list of players that need scrobbling enabled
Rename isDestroyed to avoid lint error
Switch to gradle plugin 1.1.0 and raise versionCode
Clean URL before loading. Fixes issues with special characters in track/artist name
increase versionCode
Fix NullPointerException on rotation

Show/hide notification when music is played/paused

Automates showing and hiding the notification based on the music
playback state.

Also allows sticky notifications to be removed when music is paused,
without manually disabling notifications altogether.

Make notification settings change instantaneous

The SettingsFragment currently dismisses any QuickLyric notification
regardless of what the setting is changed.  Fix this so that it
immediately updates the notification state to the correct value.

Default isPlaying to true

Fixes applications that don't broadcast their media playback state and
effectively reverts to the old notification behavior in this scenario
Only show notification if connected to the internet
Update Shuffle player icon
Add an option to automatically save lyrics (#35)
Clean/Reorganize imports
Update the AZLyrics and JLyric providers so that they respond with the Error flag when they can't reach the page
Display the 'Can't connect' message when using a limited connection
Fix parsing metadata with Jsoup + consequent crash
fix bug when searching from the searchFragment
Remove useless search_action_view.xml
Add Night Mode Option (#36)
Add Night Mode Theme (fix #36)
Support additional broadcasts
Make navigation drawer go through the (transparent) status bar on Lollipop
Fix 'No need to refresh' message not showing for saved lyrics
Add overflow to lyrics screen
Import translations
Increment versionCode
